t: This Amazon fabric shaver makes clothes look 'brand new ...

One reviewer, who "couldn't be happier with the results," says the lint remover "transformed" their old, worn-out clothes and made them look "brand new ...

Fabric.com is Shutting Down - Craft Industry Alliance
s: July 16, 2024 - Fabric.com announced to vendors today that the company, which is owned by Amazon, will be shutting down at the end of 2022.
